dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And with a weird, savage growl that is a mixture of wolf

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE can´t take his eyes off the impossibility before him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lazlo starts laughing. Kessa enters the room, holding the bounty hunter duffel b The body turns around to “face” her. This gives JAKE enou He reaches over and grabs Lazlo´s head—and runs into the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the other room the Lazlo body is fumbling around witho JAKE has now returned more to his human form, though he s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes the head from Jake´s grasp and throws the screa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake places reaches into his shirt and reveals the cross

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kessa pulls Jake aside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She starts pulling him back towards the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To answer this we cut to the bomb stuffed in the Lazlo we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They scramble up the stairs—but a hand grabs her leg. She

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By now the werewolf body has found the head and takes it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is the sound of an explosion and some flames. Both Kessa and Jake stand and watch for a moment, before

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are running down the street—Kessa pulls on his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is pointing at the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun is starting to rise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She makes a sound and gesure with her hands, as if someth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. You think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods a yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit. Let´s go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both continue… Jake and Kessa duck into a nearby building –and see that

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up we go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks past her and starts up the stairs. She follows, On the way up they try getting in through the doors but t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There must be an open floor up here—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They continue…sounds still behind them… Finally they get to the top—and can see the sunlight leak He quickly takes Kessa´s arm, opens the door and pulls th For a moment they´re both blinded by the light. But nothi They stand before the closed door, incredulous. Kessa exa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can´t believe it. The sun is up and I´m not frying. I haven´t seen daylight in six hundred years…

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Must be one of the good side effects of Lazlo´s experimen Maybe something good came out of this for you after all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stares at him….

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did you save me back there—when your  brother was going to kill me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I…don´t know. I guess I have this annoying habit of helpi people who need it. (PAUSE). Why didn´t  you split after killed him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figured I´d return the favor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is loud banging on the door, but it holds. They hea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We´re trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kessa walks to the edge of the building and looks down. A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands beside her and looks down below, shaking his he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes light up.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: The crowd has manage to get the door open. But when they

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did they go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A skyline shot of New York City widens out to show Jake a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never thought I´d be able to leave that place…life´s a funny thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods in agreement and walks out of frame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything. Everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want to do first?.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about getting to know each other better?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gestures for him to come to her. Intention is clear. Jake smiles and lets out a wolfish “howl” as goes to her.

dialogues.speaker: END
